title: Self driving model cars
subtitle: using algorithmns to follow lines and avoid obstacles
description:
# NZTA Innovation Centre
 
 We have 6 model cars with sensors for vision, proximity etc, 
 controlled by Arduinos teach them to solve 
 4 challenges - move, follow a line, avoid obstacles, 
 get to a destination etc. 
 
 ## We need:
 * Open space with room for the test tracks - e.g a school hall
 * teams of 5 students
 * on adult helper per team, should be able to follow instructions and understand a little C++
 
 ## Learning outcomes:
 * programming a remote device
 * simple coding
 * algorithmic thinking
 * problem solving.
location: NZTA Innovation Centre, 5 Cook St Auckland
